Key Match Events: Domantas Sabonis' game-winning putback with 0.7 seconds remaining gave the Sacramento Kings a 111-110 comeback win over the Miami Heat
Miami was outscored by 20 points in the third quarter for the second time this season
Post-Match Reflections: Miami was unable to close the game at the charity stripe
Butler and Tyler Herro both tallied a game-high 27 points apiece
Bam Adebayo finished with 16 points, eight rebounds, five assists, three steals, and four blocks in 36 minutes
Pelle Larsson showed out off the bench with 13 points on 4-of-6 shooting and 3-of-5 from beyond the arc
Terry Rozier had 10 points on 3-of-6 from deep with five rebounds and four assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat’s inability to control offensive rebounds and second-chance points
The Kings’ 11 offensive rebounds and seven second-chance buckets
